mapper.select: select video_seq, video_id, video_title, video_channel_name, video_duration, video_view_cnt, video_cal, created_at, updated_at , (select count(*) from wish w where w.video_seq = v.video_seq and w.is_valid = 1) as video_wish_cnt , (select count(*) from comment c where c.video_seq = v.video_seq and c.is_valid = 1) as video_comment_cnt FROM VIDEO v WHERE video_seq = #{videoSeq} AND is_valid = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO (video_seq, video_id, video_title, video_channel_name, video_duration, video_cal) values (0, #{videoId}, #{videoTitle}, #{videoChannelName}, #{videoDuration}, #{videoCal})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH WHERE video_seq = #{videoSeq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq} AND is_valid = 1
